SummaryEnglish: Agetarou works at his family's tonkatsu restaurant in Shibuya, but he's not very excited by the work. One day, he takes a delivery to the staff of a night club, and the worker lets him in to enjoy the club for a while. Agetarou finds that he loves the club, with its relaxed people and cute girls, all enjoying the music supplied by the DJ. He continues going to the club, until the night comes when the guest American DJ Big Master Fly puts on a show. Agetarou is inspired by Big Master Fly, and realizes that the groove of being a DJ is very similar to the groove of being a tonkatsu chef. Now Agetarou is determined to master both disciplines, though he is most excited to become a DJ!

1.SummaryEnglish: Agetarou would rather go clubbing than work at his family's tonkatsu restaurant. But his tonkatsu-making skills might be the key to making him the greatest DJ of all time!

2.SummaryEnglish: Agetarou learns the sacred art of diggin' for records at his local shop, gathers up some equipment and hosts his first party.

3.SummaryEnglish: Agetarou makes a weird deal with DJ Oily to learn the secrets of the Quick Mix.

4.SummaryEnglish: It's time for Agetarou's first DJ session! But can he master Scratchin' and Poppin', the final secrets of the DJ's art?!

5.SummaryEnglish: Agetarou's first real audience is hungry for both tonkatsu and beats. Can he sail through smoothly, or will he fall prey to the DJ demons?

6.SummaryEnglish: Agetarou's next lesson opens his eyes to the world of chillin'. But his quest for the ideal chill might spell the end to his DJ career!

7.SummaryEnglish: Japan's coolest freelance writer is moved by Agetarou's funkiness. Will his words inspire the young man to lead the new generation of DJ talent?

8.SummaryEnglish: Agetarou learns about EDM when a Korean DJ heats up one cold dance floor. When a whole crowd wants yakiniku, what's a tonkatsu DJ to do?

9.SummaryEnglish: Agetarou gets some sweet and spicy inspiration from a pair of cute girl DJs... but his own flavor mix still has a long way to go!

10.SummaryEnglish: The "Newcomer Killer" is out to kill his Agetarou's career! Lured from the safety of his home turf in Shibuya, can he handle Ikebukuro's hip-hop heat?!

11.SummaryEnglish: Despondent over his mentor's lack of popularity, Agetarou plots a way to throw Oily into the DJ spotlight!

12.SummaryEnglish: DJ Oily's Lard City event is ready to heat up! But will the biggest snow in a century force the guests to cancel and leave the party cold?
